articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: Europe Launches Spacecraft to Explore Asteroid Hit by NASA - VOA Learning English
articles.description: A European spacecraft has been launched to explore an asteroid struck in a planetary defense mission led by the American space agency NASA.
articles.content:
A European spacecraft has been launched to explore an asteroid struck in an earlier planetary defense mission by the American space agency NASA.
The European Space Agency (ESAs) Hera spacecraft laun… [+3816 chars]

articles.author: Steven Janowski
articles.title: Christopher Columbus was a Sephardic Jew from Western Europe, study finds - New York Post
articles.description: The 15th-century explorer Christopher Columbus was a Sephardic Jew from Western Europe, Spanish scientists said on Saturday, after using DNA analysis to tackle a centuries-old mystery.
articles.content:
Christopher Columbus wasnt Italian or even originally Catholic but instead a Sephardic Jew likely from Spain who hid his heritage to avoid persecution, a new genetic study suggests.
